alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 10:22PM EDT until March 18 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT/945 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN MEADE AND EAST CENTRAL BRECKINRIDGE COUNTIES... At 1022 PM EDT/922 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles east of Hardinsburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Irvington, Ekron, Maples Corner, Guston, Big Spring, Buck Grove, Hillgrove, Garrett, Bewleyville and Basin Spring. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
